attributes.action: Establish a legal basis for a fixed term of Government of 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our current "constitution" is too undemocratic for a 21st century country and gives too much power to the incumbent Government to decide when a general election should be held.  In some instances this is done when it suits and benefits their party rather than the country.  Instead of the current situation, the UK should adopt the US principle of general elections on a set day at either a four or five year interval.
